summary: Respectable lawyer Peter picks up Anna, an Italian woman of dubious virtue, from the club and takes her back to his Uncle's place. They soon discover they are not alone. A gunman Quill (Julian Mateos), is waiting for them.
cast: Giovanna Ralli|Frank Wolff|Fernando Rey|Julián Mateos|Karin Schubert|Leonardo Scavino|Franco Marletta|Gianni Garko
title: Los fríos ojos del miedo
